coreAttributes.name: Rapier
coreAttributes.description: An Arcane created rapier with an elegant swept back basket-hilt designed to protect the users hand.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] rapier at [npc.her] hip, so that [npc.she] may draw it at a moment's notice.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stab)] [npc.her] rapier at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane blade travels through [npc2.her] body!
Thrusting out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] rapier, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal blade travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(stab)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] rapier with a flurry of strikes, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal blade passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] rapier, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(stab)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] rapier with a flurry of strikes, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
